directions: Mix tuna, mayonnaise, peanuts, raisins, and celery in a bowl. Season with  curry powder, salt, black pepper, sugar, garlic powder, and cayenne pepper. Stir in onion and green onions. Serve on sliced bread.
ingredients: 1 pinch white sugar, or to taste
1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste
title: Crunchy Curry Tuna Sandwich
